OneLineDescription: Forwards relevant records from Lawless and its patches
LongDescription:
The following records are forwarded from Lawless (Bandit War.esp) and its patches (esp contains Bandit War in its name). For patchers I do not check if it uses Bandit War.esp as a master because I don't know any good way to not include data from dynamic patchers such as EasyNPC.
ACBS - Configuration
TPLT - Template
Items
AIDT - AI Data
Packages
CNAM - Class
DNAM - Player Skills
ZNAM - Combat Style
Name
DOFT - Default Outift
Perks
